# sugaro ğŸ¬

A lightweight multi-purpose Python toolkit with **zero dependencies**.  
Inspired by lodash (JS) and syntax sugar utilities.

- ğŸ“‚ Easy file I/O â†’ `read()`, `write()`
- ğŸ“‘ JSON helpers â†’ `jload()`, `jdump()`
- ğŸŒ HTTP in one line â†’ `get()`, `wget()`
- â• Quick math vectors â†’ `vec(1,2,3) + vec(4,5,6)`
- ğŸ› ï¸ Daily utils â†’ `uid()`, `now()`, `mkdir()`
